xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1035222-2 La vie par volutes… 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null "A beach in Normandy, children running. Suddenly a female voice appears. A woman begins to take stock of her life, evokes a sexual assault experienced in her childhood. On the beach her children intermittently short-circuit her thoughts In the image, a sharpness never before acquired, something that seeks... A coming and going is created between the softness of this seaside scene and the interiority of this woman stripped bare at the same time. , taken as witness, the spectator attends the reconstruction of this bruised identity." 2 La vie par volutes…
